Cola Wallet extension is an application for managing digital assets in your browser. It allows you to easily and quickly manage your wallet.
Cola Wallet is an unmanaged Wallet product that allows customers to store their own cryptocurrencies and use Dapps. With the Wallet extension, you can use hundreds of DApps, trade tokens in dex, earn interest in your cryptocurrency and buy NFTs. This wallet extension ensures compatibility with all mobile wallets, you can restore the wallet on your phone with the private key, so you don't have to worry about switching to another wallet when you need to recreate a new address.
